Aux:TextAnnotations.Aux:document_text: Transient Use Agreement involving a Tennessee Board of Regents institution This Agreement, entered into as of this 14th day of______August______, 2009 , made by and between _____________________South Central Tennessee Workforce Alliance_____________________ hereinafter called the Owner, and ___________________________Tennessee Board of Regents____________________________ hereinafter called the User. WITNESSETH: A. This Agreement provides for the User to have access to and use of certain facilities of the Owner for specific hours and days, with the Owner retaining the facilities for its own use during other times, and the Owner retaining responsibility for normal utilities, security, upkeep, maintenance, and custodial care. The general Terms and Conditions are hereby made a part of this Agreement as fully as if incorporated verbatim herein, and are those contained in: TBR OFD January 2005 Standard Document 40703 (2 pages) Mutual or Transient Use Terms and Conditions B. TERM OF AGREEMENT: The term of this Agreement shall commence on August 14, 2009 and shall end on June 30, 2010 . Normal Notice for Termination shall be:_____________30_____________days. C. RENTAL shall be onetime payment: ______$5000______, payable upon receipt of invoice. D. NOTICES shall be addressed: to Owner at: to User at: South Central Tennessee Workforce Tennessee Board of Regents Alliance Office of Access and Diversity #8 Public Square, 2nd Floor 1415 Murfreesboro Rd, Ste. 350 Columbia, TN 38401 Nashville, TN 37217 Based on Jan ’05 Sid 40503-1 E. Location: The Owner hereby agrees to let the User access and make use of certain premises with the appurtenances situated in the County of Perry________________________, City of Linden_______________________, located at 113 Factory Street, Linden, TN 37096__________________________________, and more particularly described as follows: Tennessee Career Center at Perry County (1) Primary Use Area: The User will have full use of this area: Office space for REAP Coordinator who will be working in Perry county with Perry county residents. (2) Secondary Use Area: The User will be further permitted to use these common areas on the same premises: (3) Restricted Area: The User will refrain from entering or using these areas: (4) During the Term of this Use Agreement, the User shall have use of Primary and Secondary areas during the following periods: August 14, 2009-June 30, 2010 (5) Exceptions to the normal periods of use, due to Owner closings for holidays or other reasons, include: (6) Specific scheduling of User’s activities on the premises shall be managed by: Wendy Thompson (7) The User shall generally confine its activities on premises to the following purposes: Meet with Perry county residents who will be participating in the REAP Perry county program, providing one year free education to unemployed Perry county residents. IN WITNESS WHEREOF, this Agreement has been executed by the parties hereto: SOUTH CENTRAL TENNESSEE WORKFORCE ALLIANCE TENNESSEE BOARD OF REGENTS BY: or Signatures must be by persons having contractual authority’for the institutions, typically a President for University’ or Community College and the Vice-Chancellor or designated Director for a Technology1 Center. Individual names and titles should be edited in place of the generic “Institution Executive”, and this note removed. Based on Jan ’05 Std 40503-2
